Author: Doug Ball
Items:
Acceptance Criteria: '*Given* a user on the loan dashboard, where verifications have been completed and the direct pay information in CLASS is empty,
*When* viewing the payment language
*Then* auto-pay is present.' -> '*OneMain.Financial/Accounts*

*Given* a user on the loan dashboard, where verifications have been completed and the direct pay information in CLASS is empty,
*When* viewing the account options verbiage,
*Then* ?Direct Pay? is has been replaced with ?AutoPay?'
